Description: Piece of factory-made, multicoloured, printed textile decorated with a variety of arabesque motifs.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995, London, Museum of Mankind (Room 5), 'Display and Modesty'
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Dr B John Mack
Acquisition notes: Af1991,11.1 to 10 is recorded in the purchase/donation book as "A small collection of textiles and dresses mainly from Siwa and Bahriyah oases, Egypt. Purchased in Cairo, June 1991." The collection was made by Dr John Mack and Chris Spring.
